    • Method Detail

      • setParts

        public SchedulesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setParts(java.util.List<java.lang.String> parts)
        List of optional parts to be backed up. Use the Parts.list() method to get information about the supported parts. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null all the optional parts will not be backed up.
        Parameters:
        parts - New value for the property.

      • setBackupPassword

        public SchedulesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setBackupPassword(char[] backupPassword)
        Password for a backup piece. The backupPassword must adhere to the following password requirements: At least 8 characters, cannot be more than 20 characters in length. At least 1 uppercase letter. At least 1 lowercase letter. At least 1 numeric digit. At least 1 special character (i.e. any character not in [0-9,a-z,A-Z]). Only visible ASCII characters (for example, no space). This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null the backup piece will not be encrypted.
        Parameters:
        backupPassword - New value for the property.

      • setLocationUser

        public SchedulesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setLocationUser(java.lang.String locationUser)
        Username for the given location. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null authentication will not be used for the specified location.
        Parameters:
        locationUser - New value for the property.

      • setLocationPassword

        public SchedulesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setLocationPassword(char[] locationPassword)
        Password for the given location. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null authentication will not be used for the specified location.
        Parameters:
        locationPassword - New value for the property.

      • setEnable

        public SchedulesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setEnable(java.lang.Boolean enable)
        Enable or disable a schedule. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null the schedule will be enabled.
        Parameters:
        enable - New value for the property.

      • setRecurrenceInfo

        public SchedulesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setRecurrenceInfo(SchedulesTypes.RecurrenceInfo recurrenceInfo)
        Recurrence information for the schedule. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null backup job will not be scheduled. See SchedulesTypes.RecurrenceInfo
        Parameters:
        recurrenceInfo - New value for the property.

      • setRetentionInfo

        public SchedulesTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setRetentionInfo(SchedulesTypes.RetentionInfo retentionInfo)
        Retention information for the schedule. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7 If null all the completed backup jobs will be retained forever. See SchedulesTypes.RetentionInfo
        Parameters:
        retentionInfo - New value for the property.
